documentation.text:
@dev this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared
 @param ballotId this is the ballot Id which is generated

@dev this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared
 @param ballotId this is the ballot Id which is generated

BallotCreated(uint256).details: this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared

params.ballotId: this is the ballot Id which is generated

BallotResult(uint256,bool,bool).details: this event is generated when result of a ballot is declared

params.ballotId: this is the ballot Id for which result is declared
params.minTurnOut: this status indicates if minimum amount of user showed up for voting more than 66% of votes or false if user lost
params.result: this is the status of the result either true if user won that is he received

DepositClaimed(address,uint256,uint256).details: this will be emitted when the user makes claim

params.ballotId: This is the id of the voting ballot
params.depositAmount: This is the amount of token that are deposited by the user
params.owner: This is the owner of the voting deposit

DepositCreated(address,uint256,uint256,b.details: this will be emitted when a deposit is made

params.ballotId: This is the id of the voting ballot
params.depositAmount: This is the amount of token that are deposited by the user
params.isClaimed: This represents if a deposit has been claimed or not
params.isPresent: This represents if a deposit has been actually created or not
params.owner: This is the owner of the voting deposit

_handleUserTokenTransfers(address,uint25.details: This function will be called when either user is transferring the tokens to other account, or is receiving tokens from other tokens.

params.newBalance: this is the new balance of the user that is after the transfer
params.previousBalance: this is the old balance of the user
params.user: address of the user whose balance is being changed

initialize(address,address).details: This is to set the address of the contracts

params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the address of new treasury contract

setDepositAmount(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_DEPOSIT percentage

params.depositAmount: This is the new deposit amount needed for creating ballot

setMinTurnOut(uint256).details: This function sets the MIN_TURN_OUT percentage

params.minTurnOut: This is the new turnout percentage value

setOwnerAddress(address).details: This function sets the owner address

params.ownerAddress: This is the address of the owner

setVotingPeriod(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_BLOCK_PERIOD percentage
